name: Lumennati
description:
A 2D platformer created for VimJam3. As you are exploring a cave, you have an accident and fall deep in with no way back up. Soon you come across Lumen the fire spirit. Lumen promises to help you out of the cave if you can prove yourself through various mechanisms and obstacles in between you and the exit.

VIMJAM3

  • Focus - Multi-Use - Use Lumen to power and destroy the many obstacles in your way to the exit
  • Theme - Turn Up the Heat - Lumen's source of power is fire, and is capable of burning numerous obstacles in your path.

CONTROLS:

  • Movement:
    • Keyboard: a (left), d (right), shift (run), space (jump)
    • Controller: analogue stick (left + right), xbox (a) playstation (x) (run), xbox (b) playstation (circle) (jump)
  • Interaction:
    • Keyboard: t or u (target the flame), e or j (turn up the heat)
    • Controller: xbox (RB) playstation (R1) (target the flame), xbox (x) playstation (square) (turn up the heat)
